mapper.select: select l.lecture_id, l.title, l.price, l.discount, l.level, l.fileName, t.teacher_name, c.cname, d.dname,price - round(price * discount/100,0) as realprice, round(avg(score), 1) as score , count(li.lecture_id) as count_listener, count(r.lecture_id) as count_review from lecture l, teacher t, categorie c, detail_categorie d, listener li, review r where t.teacher_id = l.teacher_id and c.categorie_num = l.categorie_num and d.detail_num = l.detail_num and r.lecture_id = l.lecture_id and li.listener_id = r.listener_id and discount = 100 group by l.lecture_id;

select l.lecture_id, l.title, l.price, l.discount, l.level, l.fileName, t.teacher_name, c.cname, d.dname,price - round(price * discount/100,0) as realprice, round(avg(score), 1) as score , count(li.lecture_id) as count_listener, count(r.lecture_id) as count_review from lecture l, teacher t, categorie c, detail_categorie d, listener li, review r where t.teacher_id = l.teacher_id and c.categorie_num = l.categorie_num and d.detail_num = l.detail_num and r.lecture_id = l.lecture_id and li.listener_id = r.listener_id and level = '입문' group by l.lecture_id;
